long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: As you watch a YouTube video, there are times when you want to summarize something, write down an idea that comes to mind, or save a moment you want to see it again later. YouTube Memo appears on the right side of the video, allowing you to write memos with a timestamp. The memo acts as a link to that moment in the video. Also, videos with memos are automatically added to your favorites so you can browse them later.
